channel.title: Help With Command
channel.description: I need the character command like ::char where it brings up character screen and you can change what you look like please someone post the code

item.title: Help With Command
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I don’t have my computer with files on it, but what you can do is download a source with this command, go into client.java, and look for “char” until you find the command, copy it and put it in your client.java under a already existing command.

Hope this helps,
Play For Keeps

Read full topic
